text: The UCLA Bruins men's basketball team is an American college basketball team. The team plays for the University of California, Los Angeles. The team plays in Division I of the NCAA. The team is in the Pac-12 Conference. The team was made in 1919. As of 2023, it has won 11 NCAA Championships. The Bruins won 10 NCAA Championships from 1964 to 1975. During this time, the team was coached by John Wooden. UCLA will join the Big Ten Conference in 2024. == References == Category:Basketball teams in the United States Category:University of California, Los Angeles Category:College basketball Category:1919 establishments in California
title: UCLA Bruins men's basketball
